sentences.sContent: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
My mother was in the kitchen.
He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.sCn: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.sContent: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.sCn: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.sContent: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.sCn: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.sContent: My parents live in New Zealand now.

synos.tran: 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内

phrases.pCn: 在工作或娱乐中总是马不停蹄
作为感谢、致敬或表示尊重

words.tran: 向内的；内部的；精神的；本质上的；熟悉的
内心的；最里面的，最深处的；秘密的
心底的，内心深处的；最深的

trans.tranOther: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is
